sql.if: and (CASE WHEN (A.PLANSTARTTIME > #CURRENTTIMESTR:DATE# AND G.ITEMNAME = 'INI') OR G.ITEMNAME = 'SSP' THEN '0' WHEN (G.ITEMNAME = 'COP' AND A.ACTUALFINISHTIME > A.PLANFINISHTIME) OR (A.ACTUALFINISHTIME IS NULL AND #CURRENTTIMESTR:DATE# > A.PLANFINISHTIME) THEN '1' WHEN (A.PLANSTARTTIME < #CURRENTTIMESTR:DATE# AND G.ITEMNAME = 'INI') OR (G.ITEMNAME = 'RUN' AND A.SPI < 1) THEN '2' WHEN (G.ITEMNAME = 'RUN' AND A.SPI >= 1) OR (G.ITEMNAME = 'COP' AND A.PLANFINISHTIME >= A.ACTUALFINISHTIME) THEN '3' END) = #ONTIMESTATE#

SELECT DISTINCT * FROM (SELECT A.GUID, A.MD_ID, A.MD_NAME, A.PLANNEDDURATION, A.COMPLETIONRATE PRJCOMPLETIONRATE, A.PLANSTARTTIME TASKPLANSTARTTIME, A.PLANFINISHTIME TASKPLANFINISHTIME, A.ACTUALFINISHTIME TASKACTUALFINISHTIME, A.SPI, D.CHECKPOINTNAME CHECKPOINTNAME, D.ACTUALFINISHTIME, D.PLANFINISHTIME, D.COMPLETIONRATE, C.ITEMNAME ONTIMESTATENAME, C.TITLE ONTIMESTATETITLE, G.ITEMNAME EXECUTESTATUSNAME, G.TITLE EXECUTESTATUSTITLE, H.TITLE IMPORTANCELEVELTITLE FROM $PROJECTTABLENAME$ A INNER JOIN PPM_MILESTONE_CHECKPOINT D ON A.GUID = D.TYPEGUID INNER JOIN PPM_PROJECTROLE O ON A.GUID = O.TYPEGUID INNER JOIN PPM_ROLEMEMBERS P ON O.GUID = P.PROJECTROLEGUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL C ON A.ONTIMESTATE = C.GUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL G ON A.EXECUTESTATUS = G.GUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL H ON A.IMPORTANCELEVEL = H.GUID WHERE D.OWNERTYPE = '2' AND A.PROJECTTYPE = #TYPEGUID#
ORDER BY A.PLANSTARTTIME DESC, A.GUID, D.DATASEQ) X

SELECT A.GUID, A.MD_ID, A.MD_NAME, A.PLANNEDDURATION, A.COMPLETIONRATE PRJCOMPLETIONRATE, A.PLANSTARTTIME TASKPLANSTARTTIME, A.SPI, D.CHECKPOINTNAME CHECKPOINTNAME, D.ACTUALFINISHTIME, D.PLANFINISHTIME, D.COMPLETIONRATE, C.ITEMNAME ONTIMESTATENAME, C.TITLE ONTIMESTATETITLE, G.ITEMNAME EXECUTESTATUSNAME, G.TITLE EXECUTESTATUSTITLE, H.TITLE IMPORTANCELEVELTITLE FROM $PROJECTTABLENAME$ A INNER JOIN PPM_MILESTONE_CHECKPOINT D ON A.GUID = D.TYPEGUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL C ON A.ONTIMESTATE = C.GUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL G ON A.EXECUTESTATUS = G.GUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL H ON A.IMPORTANCELEVEL = H.GUID WHERE D.OWNERTYPE = '2' AND A.PROJECTTYPE = #TYPEGUID#
ORDER BY A.PLANSTARTTIME DESC,A.GUID,D.DATASEQ
